name: Tab-Options
description: Detects duplicate tabs, asks before closing duplicate tabs and focuses the existing one. Export and Import tabs

scripts.dev:chrome: pnpm copy-manifest:chrome && rimraf dev-build/chrome && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dev-build/chrome --no-cache
scripts.dev:firefox: pnpm copy-manifest:firefox && rimraf dev-build/firefox && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dev-build/firefox --no-cache
scripts.build:chrome: pnpm copy-manifest:chrome && rimraf dist/chrome && parcel build src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist/chrome --no-cache --no-source-maps
scripts.build:firefox: pnpm copy-manifest:firefox && rimraf dist/firefox && parcel build src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist/firefox --no-cache --no-source-maps

author: iambluepie@gmail.com
